archimate:BusinessObject.name: Standard Sales PowerPoint
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
Sales do not like the idea of images in a Word or PDF file that can't be edited. Colors or other aspects of a presentation may need to be corrected.
Should we consider Sales' opinions on the PowerPoints? Rationale for No: There will be as many opinions about the PowerPoints as there are people. It's better that the stored PowerPoints are "good enough" and that Sales edit them as needed.
Will we create one sales powerpoint that cover several questions and then re-use that file in several questions or create on PowerPoint which cover the specific question?
